text: Stahlman Point is a mountain that lies in Linn County, Oregon in the Willamette National Forest about two miles south of the town of Detroit. Stahlman Point is best known for being a hiking area. The top provides views of Detroit Lake, the small town of Idanha, and Mt. Jefferson. ==References== Category:Mountains of Linn County, Oregon Category:Mountains of Oregon
title: Stahlman Point
